title: Grow a Garden
description: A free-to-play multiplayer idle game where players tend to their garden by buying seeds and harvesting crops for money.

title: Kingmakers
description: An action/strategy sandbox game set in medieval Great Britain, allowing players to use modern weapons in medieval times.

title: Ninja Gaiden 4
description: The latest installment in the Ninja Gaiden series, featuring fast-paced combat and a new protagonist, Yakumo.

title: Arc Raiders
description: An upcoming extraction shooter that gained significant attention during its playtest, with high concurrent player counts.

title: Monster Hunter: Wilds
description: The latest entry in the Monster Hunter series, offering expansive environments and new monsters to hunt.

title: Hades II
description: The sequel to the critically acclaimed Hades, featuring new characters and deeper narrative elements.

title: Split Fiction
description: A co-op adventure game from the creators of 'It Takes Two', offering a unique narrative and gameplay mechanics.

title: Abiotic Factor
description: A survival crafting experience set in an underground research facility, blending paranormal elements with gameplay.

title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
description: The sequel to the critically acclaimed Kingdom Come: Deliverance, set in 15th century Bohemia during a civil war.

title: Final Fantasy Tactics - The Ivalice Chronicles
description: A remastered version of the classic tactical RPG, featuring enhanced graphics and voice acting.

title: Donkey Kong Bananza
description: A new entry in the Donkey Kong series, offering fresh gameplay mechanics and vibrant visuals.

title: Monster Train 2
description: The sequel to the popular deckbuilding roguelike, introducing new mechanics and challenges.
